elements.name: hex-alpha-color-picker
elements.description: A color picker custom element that uses HEX format with alpha.

attributes.name: .color
attributes.description: Selected color in HEX format.

attributes.name: @color-changed
attributes.description: Event fired when color property changes.

attributes.name: .color
attributes.description: Selected color in HEX format.

attributes.description: Event fired when color property changes.

elements.name: hex-input
elements.description: A custom element for entering color in HEX format.

attributes.name: .color
attributes.description: Color in HEX format.

attributes.name: .alpha
attributes.description: When true, `#rgba` and `#rrggbbaa` color formats are allowed.

attributes.name: .prefixed
attributes.description: When true, `#` prefix is displayed in the input.

attributes.name: @color-changed
attributes.description: Event fired when color is changed.
